name: .RXDOC File Extension
summary: Learn about .RXDOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an RXDOC file in iZotope RX Audio Editor (Windows, Mac). To do so, select File → Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your RXDOC file.
You can use iZotope RX Audio Editor to convert the audio an RXDOC file contains to several more common audio formats, including:
To do so, open your RXDOC file and then select File → Export....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
